**Annual Fuel Tank Inspection Services - RCMP Saskatchewan**

**Contract Solicitation Information**

* Contract Reference: cb-6049-61231401
* Solicitation Number: M5000-21-1708/A
* Publication Date: May 31, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 30, 2023, 16:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* Amendment Date: June, 30, 2023
* Status: Expiry

**Procurement Details**

* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal
* Method: Competitive – Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: [*Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement*], [*Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)*], [...and others, up to [*World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)*]]
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: Saskatchewan, Canada

**Contract Description**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to provide fuel tank inspection services for its storage tanks in Saskatchewan. The scope of work includes annual precision leak tests on tanks and associated piping that fall under the Storage Tank Systems for Petroleum Products and Allied Petroleum Products Regulations, 2008 (STR).

**Contractor Requirements**

* The contractor must certify as an Indigenous business under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
* The contractor must comply with PSIB requirements.
* Security requirements: The contractor must have all personnel working on site security cleared at the level Facility Access with Escort, as verified by the Personnel Security Unit (PSU) of the RCMP.

**Submission Instructions**

* Bids must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at [NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca).
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Refer to attached tender documents for further information. Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. [2 Attachments: SRCL.pdf, RFP.pdf, attachment-2-to-annex-a---rcmp-sts-checklist.pdf] [2 attachments: pièce-joine-2-a-lannexe-a.pdf, ddp.pdf, srcl.pdf] .
